about_the_game:
A pirate fantasy world with a dark twist


The world of Saltaria is a vast ocean planet covered with many different islands and biomes. But don't let the beauty of tropical islands and an azure sea fool you... Human-sized insects, deadly predators, strange beasts, undead pirates and massive sea monsters will bring out your worst fears and test your mettle as you travel around in search of resources and treasure.

Design and decorate your ship


Construct, manage and expand your very own ship. Your ship is as much your mobile base as it is a battle station. Protect it from rival pirates or use it to attack and plunder other ships.

Fight with style


Test your dodging and blocking skills with a snappy combat system.
Saltaria offers a large arsenal of melee weapons, firearms an magic weapons. Each weapon has unique properties and can be upgraded from 0 to max level.

Unlock and progress


Who says a pirate can't be technologically progressive?
Unlock new blueprints for craftables, ship parts, gadgets, weapons and much more as you level up.

Explore the depths


Face your thalassophobia and dive down into the depths of Saltaria's dark ocean. Explore underwater areas, discover the remains and secrets of a lost civilization and face off against massive sea creatures.

Power crystals & magic


Prepare yourself to enter dark dungeons and deep caves to obtain the most valuable resource in the world of Saltaria; power crystals. Their immense contained forces allow you to enchant and create weapons with magic and create all sorts of magical objects. Are you brave enough to face the foes that guard them?

Features

  • Dark Fantasy Pirate World
  • In-depth ship building and designing (mobile base on which you can build anything)
  • Easy to learn, hard to master combat
  • Naval combat
  • Co-op and pvp dueling
  • A massive semi-procedural open world
  • A technology tree that is tied to an RPG progression system
  • Dungeons
  • Trading
  • Survival / crafting
  • Underwater exploration and massive sea creatures

short_description: Build, design and sail your ship in the oceanic world of Saltaria. Explore fantastical islands surrounded by a vast ocean. Discover strange beasts, defeat challenging foes and make your way to the Ring of Fire. Are you ready to take on the high seas?
